channel.title: About the The Human Side category
channel.description:
Even though OGM is obsessed with tools for visualization, storytelling and more, it operates under the assumption that [emotion and membership trump reason most of the time](https://bra.in/2vPB9q).
The conversation here is about dialogue, deliberation, debate, vulnerability, trust, bridging the cultural divide -- all the human parts of coming together to make better decisions.
